properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papulakoraku prabhuyesu siluvalo baliyaye Papiki rakshananichenu paavana rakthamu karchi{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dushta jagamuna Ela tirigedavu priyuda ? Munigedavela yennadu papamulo ? Daachina neevu ne papamunu priyudaa Nitya jeevamunu elaagu pondedavu ?{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Papabharamu krinda padiyunna priyudaa Prabhuni kadaku rammu vishraantikai Nemmadi nichunu deenulaku priyudaa Idiye Yesuni vaaghdaanamu nammu{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Naraka margamu vishaalamu priyudaa Jeevamunaku povumargamu iruku Prabhu yesuve nija margamu priyudaa Paramu cheruduvu Yesuni dwaaraane{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Ihaloka nee bratuku needaye priyuda Papa dukkamutho nindiyunnadi Deenudavai neevu shuddhini korumu priyudaa Dorukunu rakshana eekshaname{/lang-eng}
